title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 248 - Use Of Ultra Low Sulfur Diesel Fuel And Best Available Retrofit Technology For Heavy Duty Vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 248 - Use Of Ultra Low Sulfur Diesel Fuel And Best Available Retrofit Technology For Heavy Duty Vehicles

Subpart 248-1 - DEFINITIONS (§ 248-1.1)

Subpart 248-2 - APPLICABILITY (§ 248-2.1)

Subpart 248-3 - COMPLIANCE REQUIREMENTS (§ 248-3.1)

Subpart 248-4 - WAIVER PROVISIONS (§ 248-4.1)

Subpart 248-5 - VEHICLE AND EQUIPMENT LABELING REQUIREMENTS (§ 248-5.1)

Subpart 248-6 - REPORTING REQUIREMENTS (§ 248-6.1)

Subpart 248-7 - RECORDKEEPING REQUIREMENTS (§ 248-7.1)

Subpart 248-8 - CONTRACTOR COMPLIANCE REQUIREMENTS (§ 248-8.1)

Subpart 248-9 - RIGHT OF ENTRY (§ 248-9.1)

Subpart 248-10 - NON-COMPLIANCE (§ 248-10.1)

Subpart 248-11 - SEVERABILITY (§ 248-11.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 248

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 19-0323, 71-2103, 71-2105

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
